title: Find & Use Materials: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Start your research with the following tools: Mudd Library's most circulated titles will be housed in open stacks and available for self checkout. Mudd Library does not issue Borrower's cards or accept overdue fines and fees. Visit the University (Main) Library's circulation desk to speak with a staff member about Borrower's cards and fines and fees.Â Additional borrowing information and procedures can be found online: Course reserves are materials that have been put on hold for use by a specific class. They have a shorter check-out time than most materials. Physical course reserves at Mudd Library will be available in the open stacks and can be checked out using the self checkout system. For information on putting items on reserve, visit the Reserve Information for Faculty page.
